features.title: Optimized Writing & Editing Experience
features.description: Your tools, your files. Use any Markdown editor you love, work offline, and maintain true ownership of your content. No proprietary systems or vendor lock-in, ever.

features.title: Complete Version Control
features.description: Track every change with Git-based version control. Risk-free experimentation knowing you can always revert. Use branches for drafts, PRs for reviews, and merge to publish.

features.title: Effortless Media Handling
features.description: Drag-and-drop simplicity for adding images directly from your editor. Automatic optimization with images compressed and resized for optimal performance, all served via blazing-fast CDN.

features.title: API-First Architecture
features.description: Full SDK access to query and manipulate content from any frontend. Webhook support to trigger custom actions on content changes. Truly headless by design to use with any frontend framework.

features.title: Friction-Free Deployment
features.description: Git-powered publishing where every commit becomes a deployment automatically. No complex CI/CD setups to manage. See changes live in seconds, not minutes, with detailed logs for debugging.

features.title: Intelligent Content Structure
features.description: Extract and use frontmatter across your application. Find content by keyword or semantic similarity. Discover connections between articles and build advanced categorization systems with custom taxonomies.

faqs.question: What's the difference between PushMd and other static site generators?
faqs.answer: PushMd handles the entire pipeline—from content to deployment—without requiring you to manage build processes or hosting configuration.

faqs.question: Can I use my existing Markdown files?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! PushMd works with standard Markdown files and is especially optimized for Obsidian vaults.

faqs.question: Do I need to know Git to use PushMd?
faqs.answer: No—while Git powers our version control, you can use our desktop app or web interface if you prefer not to use Git directly.

faqs.question: Can I customize the look and feel of my site?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can choose from our ready-to-use blog templates or integrate PushMd with your own frontend for complete design control.

faqs.question: Is my content locked in?
faqs.answer: Never. Your content remains in standard Markdown format on YOUR computer. No vendor lock-in, ever.

faqs.question: How does image hosting work?
faqs.answer: Simply include images in your repository or reference them in your Markdown. We automatically optimize them, create responsive versions, and serve them through our global CDN.

faqs.question: Can I use my preferred AI tools?
faqs.answer: Yes! Unlike other platforms that lock you into specific AI tools, PushMd lets you use any AI assistant you prefer since you're working with local files.
